hisSection.no-data: No skill data available for this companion.

mySection.intro: 5★ companions' [MC] has her own special weapon. You can always switch to standard weapons but you can’t wield other companion's exclusive weapons.
mySection.no-data: No skill data available for this companion.
mySection.not_limited_companion_warning: No exclusive weapons are available for standard companions. You can only use the Standard Hunter series.

skill_NB.resonance_skill: Only this skill can destroy enemy shields. On full [Stellactrum Match], it destroys 2 shield layers.
skill_NB.ardent_oath: Usually you can use it once during a battle, use [Oath Recovery Boost] protocore to utilize it twice.

support_skill.name: Scarlet Shade
support_skill.description: Rafayel creates a Scarlet Shade dealing [AoE] DMG and inflicting [Burn]. Also leaves 3 [Flame Lilies].

resonance_skill.name: Scorching
resonance_skill.description: You ignite all [Flame Lilies] dealing [AoE] DMG and inflicting [Burn]. Each of [Flame Lilies] increases your ATK by 5% for 8s.

ardent_oath.name: Searing Motif
ardent_oath.description: You and Rafayel do a slash, dealing massive [AoE] DMG based on your combined ATK.

passive_skill.name: Flowing Flame
passive_skill.description: When your and Rafayel's skills hit enemy, he summons up to 5 [Flame Lilies] dealing [AoE] DMG. When 10 [Flame Lilies] have been used, Rafayel's [Basic Attack] DMG and attack range are increased, creating new [Flame Lilies] which deal DMG and inflict [Burn].

support_skill.name: Swirling Colors
support_skill.description: Rafayel forces the enemy into the air and kicks them to the ground. Inflicts up to 2 stacks of [Tinctus].

resonance_skill.name: Illuminating Strength
resonance_skill.description: You and Rafayel perform a series of attacks.

ardent_oath.name: Dazzling Kaleidoscope
ardent_oath.description: You and Rafayel do a slash, dealing massive [AoE] DMG based on your combined ATK.

passive_skill.name: Gilded Tinctus
passive_skill.description: Hitting enemies with [Tinctus] by [Active Skill], [Resonance Skill] or [Ardent Oath] will deal DMG to enemies and restore HP to both you and him. When 5 stacks are detonated, the enemy's DEF will be reduced by 20% for 5s.

support_skill.name: Aria
support_skill.description: Rafayel thrusts forward, dealing [AoE] DMG and reducing enemies movement speed by 30% for 5s. It leaves behind [Reprise], which deals greater DMG and reduces enemy's movement speed by 50% for 5s.

resonance_skill.name: Concerto
resonance_skill.description: You and Rafayel deal ATK DMG. If an enemy is inflicted with [Echo], they receive additional ATK DMG.

ardent_oath.name: Sonata of Reunions
ardent_oath.description: You and Rafayel do a slash, dealing massive [AoE] DMG based on your combined ATK.

passive_skill.name: Recitativo
passive_skill.description: When you and Rafayel deal DMG, you will sing Harmony, the next time you use [Aria], it will leave [Echo] behind for 5s. This increases the DMG enemies take and additionally they lose HP based on Rafayel's ATK each second.

support_skill.name: Eclipse Rend
support_skill.description: Click Rafayel's icon when ready, or trigger it with [Perfect Dodge]. Leaves a [Fishtail Beacon] on a ground restoring 2 [Potential] when picked • At max [Potential], it becomes empowered and inflict [Burn] on enemies

resonance_skill.name: Fantasia Shark
resonance_skill.description: You and Rafayel pull in enemies with chains. Fantasia Shark bites and [Burn]s them after.

ardent_oath.name: Four Scourges
ardent_oath.description: You and Rafayel do massive DMG based on your combined ATK.

passive_skill.name: Abyssal Beacon
passive_skill.description: Periodically, Rafayel applies [Beacon] to enemies. Hit it with [Charged Attack] to collect 1 [Potential].

basic_attack.name: Abyssal Rapid Fire
basic_attack.description: Wield dual guns for a combo up to 5 hits. [Charged Attack] will knock back nearby enemies.

my_passive_skill.name: Abyssal Shadow
my_passive_skill.description: Combo Attacks provide buffs with each hit, up to 5 stacks. 1 stack increases ATK Speed by 4% and CRIT Rate by 2%.

active_skill.name: Oceanic Traversal
active_skill.description: You perform one big DMG shot from your guns.

support_skill.name: Tidal Summoning
support_skill.description: Summons a [Sea Spirit]. Empowered [Tidal Summoning] restores 10% [Faith] and increases [Sea Spirit] DMG by 10%.

resonance_skill.name: Surging Tides
resonance_skill.description: You and Rafayel summon tides dealing DMG based on your ATK + HP.

ardent_oath.name: Oceanic Harmony
ardent_oath.description: You and Rafayel summon a whale, dealing massive DMG based on your combined ATK + HP.

passive_skill.name: Frenzy Surge
passive_skill.description: Hits from you, Rafayel, and [Sea Spirits] restore [Faith]. When full, it triggers [Heavenly Rain] which increases DMG dealt by 30% and boosts the level of all [Sea Spirits] by 1.

basic_attack.name: Waves
basic_attack.description: Performs a multi-hit combo of up to 4 attacks based on your ATK + HP. [Charged Attack] launches enemies.

my_passive_skill.name: Sea Shanty
my_passive_skill.description: When using an [Active Skill], summons a [Sea Spirit].

active_skill.name: Tides
active_skill.description: Pushes back enemies and deals DMG based on your ATK + HP and leaves a [Tidal Field]. It provides Tidal Strength that increases CRIT Rate by 10% and stacks up to 3 times.

support_skill.name: Tide Cleaver
support_skill.description: Throws his Trident dealing DMG based on ATK + DEF to enemies in range.

resonance_skill.name: Cerulean Verdict
resonance_skill.description: You and Rafayel unleash towering waves pulling enemies inside it and dealing massive DMG based on ATK + DEF.

ardent_oath.name: Oceanic Harmony
ardent_oath.description: You and Rafayel do massive DMG based on your combined ATK + DEF.

passive_skill.name: Deepfall Rite
passive_skill.description: Upon entering the battle, Rafayel grants you a [Sea God Mark]. [Charged Attack] consumes it and it will be restored after 8s again. It is extremely powerful and especially good in [Ocean's Descent].

basic_attack.name: Wave Chase
basic_attack.description: Perform a combo up to 4 hits. [Charged Attack] creates a powerful slash and consumes a [Sea God Mark] if charged. Both scale with ATK + DEF.

my_passive_skill.name: Tide's Return
my_passive_skill.description: Consuming a [Sea God Mark] with [Charged Attack] also restores 0.5 ◆.

active_skill.name: Riptide Rend
active_skill.description: Dash forward dealing DMG based on your ATK + DEF.
